class.name: NavigationServer3D
class.brief_description: A server interface for low-level 3D navigation access.
class.description: NavigationServer3D is the server that handles navigation maps, regions and agents. It does not handle A* navigation from [AStar3D]. Maps are divided into regions, which are composed of navigation meshes. Together, they define the navigable areas in the 3D world. [b]Note:[/b] Most [NavigationServer3D] changes take effect after the next physics frame and not immediately. This includes all changes made to maps, regions or agents by navigation-related nodes in the scene tree or made through scripts. For two regions to be connected to each other, they must share a similar edge. An edge is considered connected to another if both of its two vertices are at a distance less than [code]edge_connection_margin[/code] to the respective other edge's vertex. You may assign navigation layers to regions with [method NavigationServer3D.region_set_navigation_layers], which then can be checked upon when requesting a path with [method NavigationServer3D.map_get_path]. This can be used to allow or deny certain areas for some objects. To use the collision avoidance system, you may use agents. You can set an agent's target velocity, then the servers will emit a callback with a modified velocity. [b]Note:[/b] The collision avoidance system ignores regions. Using the modified velocity directly may move an agent outside of the traversable area. This is a limitation of the collision avoidance system, any more complex situation may require the use of the physics engine. This server keeps tracks of any call and executes them during the sync phase. This means that you can request any change to the map, using any thread, without worrying.

method.name: agent_create
method.description: Creates the agent.

method.name: agent_get_avoidance_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [param agent] has avoidance enabled.

method.name: agent_get_avoidance_layers
method.description: Returns the [code]avoidance_layers[/code] bitmask of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_avoidance_mask
method.description: Returns the [code]avoidance_mask[/code] bitmask of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_avoidance_priority
method.description: Returns the [code]avoidance_priority[/code] of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_height
method.description: Returns the [code]height[/code] of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_map
method.description: Returns the navigation map [RID] the requested [param agent] is currently assigned to.

method.name: agent_get_max_neighbors
method.description: Returns the maximum number of other agents the specified [param agent] takes into account in the navigation.

method.name: agent_get_max_speed
method.description: Returns the maximum speed of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_neighbor_distance
method.description: Returns the maximum distance to other agents the specified [param agent] takes into account in the navigation.

method.name: agent_get_paused
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified [param agent] is paused.

method.name: agent_get_position
method.description: Returns the position of the specified [param agent] in world space.

method.name: agent_get_radius
method.description: Returns the radius of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_get_time_horizon_agents
method.description: Returns the minimal amount of time for which the specified [param agent]'s velocities that are computed by the simulation are safe with respect to other agents.

method.name: agent_get_time_horizon_obstacles
method.description: Returns the minimal amount of time for which the specified [param agent]'s velocities that are computed by the simulation are safe with respect to static avoidance obstacles.

method.name: agent_get_use_3d_avoidance
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [param agent] uses avoidance in 3D space Vector3(x,y,z) instead of horizontal 2D Vector2(x,y) / Vector3(x,0.0,z).

method.name: agent_get_velocity
method.description: Returns the velocity of the specified [param agent].

method.name: agent_has_avoidance_callback
method.description: Return [code]true[/code] if the specified [param agent] has an avoidance callback.

method.name: agent_is_map_changed
method.description: Returns true if the map got changed the previous frame.

method.name: agent_set_avoidance_callback
method.description: Sets the callback [Callable] that gets called after each avoidance processing step for the [param agent]. The calculated [code]safe_velocity[/code] will be dispatched with a signal to the object just before the physics calculations. [b]Note:[/b] Created callbacks are always processed independently of the SceneTree state as long as the agent is on a navigation map and not freed. To disable the dispatch of a callback from an agent use [method agent_set_avoidance_callback] again with an empty [Callable].

method.name: agent_set_avoidance_enabled
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the provided [param agent] calculates avoidance.

method.name: agent_set_avoidance_layers
method.description: Set the agent's [code]avoidance_layers[/code] bitmask.

method.name: agent_set_avoidance_mask
method.description: Set the agent's [code]avoidance_mask[/code] bitmask.

method.name: agent_set_avoidance_priority
method.description: Set the agent's [code]avoidance_priority[/code] with a [param priority] between 0.0 (lowest priority) to 1.0 (highest priority). The specified [param agent] does not adjust the velocity for other agents that would match the [code]avoidance_mask[/code] but have a lower [code]avoidance_priority[/code]. This in turn makes the other agents with lower priority adjust their velocities even more to avoid collision with this agent.

method.name: agent_set_height
method.description: Updates the provided [param agent] [param height].

method.name: agent_set_map
method.description: Puts the agent in the map.

method.name: agent_set_max_neighbors
method.description: Sets the maximum number of other agents the agent takes into account in the navigation. The larger this number, the longer the running time of the simulation. If the number is too low, the simulation will not be safe.

method.name: agent_set_max_speed
method.description: Sets the maximum speed of the agent. Must be positive.

method.name: agent_set_neighbor_distance
method.description: Sets the maximum distance to other agents this agent takes into account in the navigation. The larger this number, the longer the running time of the simulation. If the number is too low, the simulation will not be safe.

method.name: agent_set_paused
method.description: If [param paused] is true the specified [param agent] will not be processed, e.g. calculate avoidance velocities or receive avoidance callbacks.

method.name: agent_set_position
method.description: Sets the position of the agent in world space.

method.name: agent_set_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of the agent.

method.name: agent_set_time_horizon_agents
method.description: The minimal amount of time for which the agent's velocities that are computed by the simulation are safe with respect to other agents. The larger this number, the sooner this agent will respond to the presence of other agents, but the less freedom this agent has in choosing its velocities. A too high value will slow down agents movement considerably. Must be positive.

method.name: agent_set_time_horizon_obstacles
method.description: The minimal amount of time for which the agent's velocities that are computed by the simulation are safe with respect to static avoidance obstacles. The larger this number, the sooner this agent will respond to the presence of static avoidance obstacles, but the less freedom this agent has in choosing its velocities. A too high value will slow down agents movement considerably. Must be positive.

method.name: agent_set_use_3d_avoidance
method.description: Sets if the agent uses the 2D avoidance or the 3D avoidance while avoidance is enabled. If [code]true[/code] the agent calculates avoidance velocities in 3D for the xyz-axis, e.g. for games that take place in air, underwater or space. The 3D using agent only avoids other 3D avoidance using agent's. The 3D using agent only reacts to radius based avoidance obstacles. The 3D using agent ignores any vertices based obstacles. The 3D using agent only avoids other 3D using agent's. If [code]false[/code] the agent calculates avoidance velocities in 2D along the xz-axis ignoring the y-axis. The 2D using agent only avoids other 2D avoidance using agent's. The 2D using agent reacts to radius avoidance obstacles. The 2D using agent reacts to vertices based avoidance obstacles. The 2D using agent only avoids other 2D using agent's. 2D using agents will ignore other 2D using agents or obstacles that are below their current position or above their current position including the agents height in 2D avoidance.

method.name: agent_set_velocity
method.description: Sets [param velocity] as the new wanted velocity for the specified [param agent]. The avoidance simulation will try to fulfill this velocity if possible but will modify it to avoid collision with other agent's and obstacles. When an agent is teleported to a new position use [method agent_set_velocity_forced] as well to reset the internal simulation velocity.

method.name: agent_set_velocity_forced
method.description: Replaces the internal velocity in the collision avoidance simulation with [param velocity] for the specified [param agent]. When an agent is teleported to a new position this function should be used in the same frame. If called frequently this function can get agents stuck.

method.name: bake_from_source_geometry_data
method.description: Bakes the provided [param navigation_mesh] with the data from the provided [param source_geometry_data]. After the process is finished the optional [param callback] will be called.

method.name: bake_from_source_geometry_data_async
method.description: Bakes the provided [param navigation_mesh] with the data from the provided [param source_geometry_data] as an async task running on a background thread. After the process is finished the optional [param callback] will be called.

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Destroys the given RID.

method.name: get_debug_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when the NavigationServer has debug enabled.

method.name: get_maps
method.description: Returns all created navigation map [RID]s on the NavigationServer. This returns both 2D and 3D created navigation maps as there is technically no distinction between them.

method.name: get_process_info
method.description: Returns information about the current state of the NavigationServer. See [enum ProcessInfo] for a list of available states.

method.name: is_baking_navigation_mesh
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when the provided navigation mesh is being baked on a background thread.

method.name: link_create
method.description: Create a new link between two positions on a map.

method.name: link_get_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified [param link] is enabled.

method.name: link_get_end_position
method.description: Returns the ending position of this [param link].

method.name: link_get_enter_cost
method.description: Returns the enter cost of this [param link].

method.name: link_get_map
method.description: Returns the navigation map [RID] the requested [param link] is currently assigned to.

method.name: link_get_navigation_layers
method.description: Returns the navigation layers for this [param link].

method.name: link_get_owner_id
method.description: Returns the [code]ObjectID[/code] of the object which manages this link.

method.name: link_get_start_position
method.description: Returns the starting position of this [param link].

method.name: link_get_travel_cost
method.description: Returns the travel cost of this [param link].

method.name: link_is_bidirectional
method.description: Returns whether this [param link] can be travelled in both directions.

method.name: link_set_bidirectional
method.description: Sets whether this [param link] can be travelled in both directions.

method.name: link_set_enabled
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the specified [param link] will contribute to its current navigation map.

method.name: link_set_end_position
method.description: Sets the exit position for the [param link].

method.name: link_set_enter_cost
method.description: Sets the [param enter_cost] for this [param link].

method.name: link_set_map
method.description: Sets the navigation map [RID] for the link.

method.name: link_set_navigation_layers
method.description: Set the links's navigation layers. This allows selecting links from a path request (when using [method NavigationServer3D.map_get_path]).

method.name: link_set_owner_id
method.description: Set the [code]ObjectID[/code] of the object which manages this link.

method.name: link_set_start_position
method.description: Sets the entry position for this [param link].

method.name: link_set_travel_cost
method.description: Sets the [param travel_cost] for this [param link].

method.name: map_create
method.description: Create a new map.

method.name: map_force_update
method.description: This function immediately forces synchronization of the specified navigation [param map] [RID]. By default navigation maps are only synchronized at the end of each physics frame. This function can be used to immediately (re)calculate all the navigation meshes and region connections of the navigation map. This makes it possible to query a navigation path for a changed map immediately and in the same frame (multiple times if needed). Due to technical restrictions the current NavigationServer command queue will be flushed. This means all already queued update commands for this physics frame will be executed, even those intended for other maps, regions and agents not part of the specified map. The expensive computation of the navigation meshes and region connections of a map will only be done for the specified map. Other maps will receive the normal synchronization at the end of the physics frame. Should the specified map receive changes after the forced update it will update again as well when the other maps receive their update. Avoidance processing and dispatch of the [code]safe_velocity[/code] signals is unaffected by this function and continues to happen for all maps and agents at the end of the physics frame. [b]Note:[/b] With great power comes great responsibility. This function should only be used by users that really know what they are doing and have a good reason for it. Forcing an immediate update of a navigation map requires locking the NavigationServer and flushing the entire NavigationServer command queue. Not only can this severely impact the performance of a game but it can also introduce bugs if used inappropriately without much foresight.

method.name: map_get_agents
method.description: Returns all navigation agents [RID]s that are currently assigned to the requested navigation [param map].

method.name: map_get_cell_height
method.description: Returns the map cell height used to rasterize the navigation mesh vertices on the Y axis.

method.name: map_get_cell_size
method.description: Returns the map cell size used to rasterize the navigation mesh vertices on the XZ plane.

method.name: map_get_closest_point
method.description: Returns the point closest to the provided [param to_point] on the navigation mesh surface.

method.name: map_get_closest_point_normal
method.description: Returns the normal for the point returned by [method map_get_closest_point].

method.name: map_get_closest_point_owner
method.description: Returns the owner region RID for the point returned by [method map_get_closest_point].

method.name: map_get_closest_point_to_segment
method.description: Returns the closest point between the navigation surface and the segment.

method.name: map_get_edge_connection_margin
method.description: Returns the edge connection margin of the map. This distance is the minimum vertex distance needed to connect two edges from different regions.

method.name: map_get_iteration_id
method.description: Returns the current iteration id of the navigation map. Every time the navigation map changes and synchronizes the iteration id increases. An iteration id of 0 means the navigation map has never synchronized. [b]Note:[/b] The iteration id will wrap back to 1 after reaching its range limit.

method.name: map_get_link_connection_radius
method.description: Returns the link connection radius of the map. This distance is the maximum range any link will search for navigation mesh polygons to connect to.

method.name: map_get_links
method.description: Returns all navigation link [RID]s that are currently assigned to the requested navigation [param map].

method.name: map_get_merge_rasterizer_cell_scale
method.description: Returns map's internal merge rasterizer cell scale.

method.name: map_get_obstacles
method.description: Returns all navigation obstacle [RID]s that are currently assigned to the requested navigation [param map].

method.name: map_get_path
method.description: Returns the navigation path to reach the destination from the origin. [param navigation_layers] is a bitmask of all region navigation layers that are allowed to be in the path.

method.name: map_get_random_point
method.description: Returns a random position picked from all map region polygons with matching [param navigation_layers]. If [param uniformly] is [code]true[/code], all map regions, polygons, and faces are weighted by their surface area (slower). If [param uniformly] is [code]false[/code], just a random region and a random polygon are picked (faster).

method.name: map_get_regions
method.description: Returns all navigation regions [RID]s that are currently assigned to the requested navigation [param map].

method.name: map_get_up
method.description: Returns the map's up direction.

method.name: map_get_use_edge_connections
method.description: Returns true if the navigation [param map] allows navigation regions to use edge connections to connect with other navigation regions within proximity of the navigation map edge connection margin.

method.name: map_is_active
method.description: Returns true if the map is active.

method.name: map_set_active
method.description: Sets the map active.

method.name: map_set_cell_height
method.description: Sets the map cell height used to rasterize the navigation mesh vertices on the Y axis. Must match with the cell height of the used navigation meshes.

method.name: map_set_cell_size
method.description: Sets the map cell size used to rasterize the navigation mesh vertices on the XZ plane. Must match with the cell size of the used navigation meshes.

method.name: map_set_edge_connection_margin
method.description: Set the map edge connection margin used to weld the compatible region edges.

method.name: map_set_link_connection_radius
method.description: Set the map's link connection radius used to connect links to navigation polygons.

method.name: map_set_merge_rasterizer_cell_scale
method.description: Set the map's internal merge rasterizer cell scale used to control merging sensitivity.

method.name: map_set_up
method.description: Sets the map up direction.

method.name: map_set_use_edge_connections
method.description: Set the navigation [param map] edge connection use. If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the navigation map allows navigation regions to use edge connections to connect with other navigation regions within proximity of the navigation map edge connection margin.

method.name: obstacle_create
method.description: Creates a new obstacle.

method.name: obstacle_get_avoidance_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [param obstacle] has avoidance enabled.

method.name: obstacle_get_avoidance_layers
method.description: Returns the [code]avoidance_layers[/code] bitmask of the specified [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_get_height
method.description: Returns the [code]height[/code] of the specified [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_get_map
method.description: Returns the navigation map [RID] the requested [param obstacle] is currently assigned to.

method.name: obstacle_get_paused
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified [param obstacle] is paused.

method.name: obstacle_get_position
method.description: Returns the position of the specified [param obstacle] in world space.

method.name: obstacle_get_radius
method.description: Returns the radius of the specified dynamic [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_get_use_3d_avoidance
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [param obstacle] uses avoidance in 3D space Vector3(x,y,z) instead of horizontal 2D Vector2(x,y) / Vector3(x,0.0,z).

method.name: obstacle_get_velocity
method.description: Returns the velocity of the specified dynamic [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_get_vertices
method.description: Returns the outline vertices for the specified [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_set_avoidance_enabled
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the provided [param obstacle] affects avoidance using agents.

method.name: obstacle_set_avoidance_layers
method.description: Set the obstacles's [code]avoidance_layers[/code] bitmask.

method.name: obstacle_set_height
method.description: Sets the [param height] for the [param obstacle]. In 3D agents will ignore obstacles that are above or below them while using 2D avoidance.

method.name: obstacle_set_map
method.description: Assigns the [param obstacle] to a navigation map.

method.name: obstacle_set_paused
method.description: If [param paused] is true the specified [param obstacle] will not be processed, e.g. affect avoidance velocities.

method.name: obstacle_set_position
method.description: Updates the [param position] in world space for the [param obstacle].

method.name: obstacle_set_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of the dynamic obstacle.

method.name: obstacle_set_use_3d_avoidance
method.description: Sets if the [param obstacle] uses the 2D avoidance or the 3D avoidance while avoidance is enabled.

method.name: obstacle_set_velocity
method.description: Sets [param velocity] of the dynamic [param obstacle]. Allows other agents to better predict the movement of the dynamic obstacle. Only works in combination with the radius of the obstacle.

method.name: obstacle_set_vertices
method.description: Sets the outline vertices for the obstacle. If the vertices are winded in clockwise order agents will be pushed in by the obstacle, else they will be pushed out.

method.name: parse_source_geometry_data
method.description: Parses the [SceneTree] for source geometry according to the properties of [param navigation_mesh]. Updates the provided [param source_geometry_data] resource with the resulting data. The resource can then be used to bake a navigation mesh with [method bake_from_source_geometry_data]. After the process is finished the optional [param callback] will be called. [b]Note:[/b] This function needs to run on the main thread or with a deferred call as the SceneTree is not thread-safe. [b]Performance:[/b] While convenient, reading data arrays from [Mesh] resources can affect the frame rate negatively. The data needs to be received from the GPU, stalling the [RenderingServer] in the process. For performance prefer the use of e.g. collision shapes or creating the data arrays entirely in code.

method.name: query_path
method.description: Queries a path in a given navigation map. Start and target position and other parameters are defined through [NavigationPathQueryParameters3D]. Updates the provided [NavigationPathQueryResult3D] result object with the path among other results requested by the query.

method.name: region_bake_navigation_mesh
method.deprecated: This method is deprecated due to core threading changes. To upgrade existing code, first create a [NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData3D] resource. Use this resource with [method parse_source_geometry_data] to parse the [SceneTree] for nodes that should contribute to the navigation mesh baking. The [SceneTree] parsing needs to happen on the main thread. After the parsing is finished use the resource with [method bake_from_source_geometry_data] to bake a navigation mesh.
method.description: Bakes the [param navigation_mesh] with bake source geometry collected starting from the [param root_node].

method.name: region_create
method.description: Creates a new region.

method.name: region_get_connection_pathway_end
method.description: Returns the ending point of a connection door. [param connection] is an index between 0 and the return value of [method region_get_connections_count].

method.name: region_get_connection_pathway_start
method.description: Returns the starting point of a connection door. [param connection] is an index between 0 and the return value of [method region_get_connections_count].

method.name: region_get_connections_count
method.description: Returns how many connections this [param region] has with other regions in the map.

method.name: region_get_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified [param region] is enabled.

method.name: region_get_enter_cost
method.description: Returns the enter cost of this [param region].

method.name: region_get_map
method.description: Returns the navigation map [RID] the requested [param region] is currently assigned to.

method.name: region_get_navigation_layers
method.description: Returns the region's navigation layers.

method.name: region_get_owner_id
method.description: Returns the [code]ObjectID[/code] of the object which manages this region.

method.name: region_get_random_point
method.description: Returns a random position picked from all region polygons with matching [param navigation_layers]. If [param uniformly] is [code]true[/code], all region polygons and faces are weighted by their surface area (slower). If [param uniformly] is [code]false[/code], just a random polygon and face is picked (faster).

method.name: region_get_transform
method.description: Returns the global transformation of this [param region].

method.name: region_get_travel_cost
method.description: Returns the travel cost of this [param region].

method.name: region_get_use_edge_connections
method.description: Returns true if the navigation [param region] is set to use edge connections to connect with other navigation regions within proximity of the navigation map edge connection margin.

method.name: region_owns_point
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [param point] in world space is currently owned by the provided navigation [param region]. Owned in this context means that one of the region's navigation mesh polygon faces has a possible position at the closest distance to this point compared to all other navigation meshes from other navigation regions that are also registered on the navigation map of the provided region. If multiple navigation meshes have positions at equal distance the navigation region whose polygons are processed first wins the ownership. Polygons are processed in the same order that navigation regions were registered on the NavigationServer. [b]Note:[/b] If navigation meshes from different navigation regions overlap (which should be avoided in general) the result might not be what is expected.

method.name: region_set_enabled
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the specified [param region] will contribute to its current navigation map.

method.name: region_set_enter_cost
method.description: Sets the [param enter_cost] for this [param region].

method.name: region_set_map
method.description: Sets the map for the region.

method.name: region_set_navigation_layers
method.description: Set the region's navigation layers. This allows selecting regions from a path request (when using [method NavigationServer3D.map_get_path]).

method.name: region_set_navigation_mesh
method.description: Sets the navigation mesh for the region.

method.name: region_set_owner_id
method.description: Set the [code]ObjectID[/code] of the object which manages this region.

method.name: region_set_transform
method.description: Sets the global transformation for the region.

method.name: region_set_travel_cost
method.description: Sets the [param travel_cost] for this [param region].

method.name: region_set_use_edge_connections
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the navigation [param region] will use edge connections to connect with other navigation regions within proximity of the navigation map edge connection margin.

method.name: set_active
method.description: Control activation of this server.

method.name: set_debug_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code] enables debug mode on the NavigationServer.

method.name: simplify_path
method.description: Returns a simplified version of [param path] with less critical path points removed. The simplification amount is in worlds units and controlled by [param epsilon]. The simplification uses a variant of Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm for curve point decimation. Path simplification can be helpful to mitigate various path following issues that can arise with certain agent types and script behaviors. E.g. "steering" agents or avoidance in "open fields".

method.name: source_geometry_parser_create
method.description: Creates a new source geometry parser. If a [Callable] is set for the parser with [method source_geometry_parser_set_callback] the callback will be called for every single node that gets parsed whenever [method parse_source_geometry_data] is used.

method.name: source_geometry_parser_set_callback
method.description: Sets the [param callback] [Callable] for the specific source geometry [param parser]. The [Callable] will receive a call with the following parameters: - [code]navigation_mesh[/code] - The [NavigationMesh] reference used to define the parse settings. Do NOT edit or add directly to the navigation mesh. - [code]source_geometry_data[/code] - The [NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData3D] reference. Add custom source geometry for navigation mesh baking to this object. - [code]node[/code] - The [Node] that is parsed.

signal.name: avoidance_debug_changed
signal.description: Emitted when avoidance debug settings are changed. Only available in debug builds.

signal.name: map_changed
signal.description: Emitted when a navigation map is updated, when a region moves or is modified.

signal.name: navigation_debug_changed
signal.description: Emitted when navigation debug settings are changed. Only available in debug builds.

constants.constant: Constant to get the number of active navigation maps.
Constant to get the number of active navigation regions.
Constant to get the number of active navigation agents processing avoidance.
Constant to get the number of active navigation links.
Constant to get the number of navigation mesh polygons.
Constant to get the number of navigation mesh polygon edges.
Constant to get the number of navigation mesh polygon edges that were merged due to edge key overlap.
Constant to get the number of navigation mesh polygon edges that are considered connected by edge proximity.
Constant to get the number of navigation mesh polygon edges that could not be merged but may be still connected by edge proximity or with links.
